name: Action Alien
description: Jump into the action and battle your way through hordes of aliens from deserts to tropical islands with fully destructible environments !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space
